attributes.action: stop MP's voting on there own pay and make them take a less than inflation pay rise everytime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's must be the only people on this earth that vote for there own pay conditions. expenses and pensions must be held to a reasonable level and not those of the super rich.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
